titleStmt.title: An impartial and exact accompt of the divers popish books, beads, crucifixes and images, taken at the Savoy by Sr. William Waller, one of His Majesties justices of the peace and burnt by order, in the New Palace-yard Westminster, the 11th of February ; written in a letter to a friend in the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Waller, William, Sir, d. 1699.

titleStmt.title: An impartial and exact accompt of the divers popish books, beads, crucifixes and images, taken at the Savoy by Sr. William Waller, one of His Majesties justices of the peace and burnt by order, in the New Palace-yard Westminster, the 11th of February ; written in a letter to a friend in the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Waller, William, Sir, d. 1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Sir William Waller. cf. Wing.
Entry for W545 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
